name: Pokémon Titan
storyline:
The protagonist of this story is a young adult, his mother decides that it is time for him to leave the house. Start your adventure through the Aleteia region, catch all kinds of Pokemon, and face the the prestigious Pokemon League.

On your way you will find many characters, friends, rivals and enemies, as you discover a story full of twists that always has something to offer.
summary:
Pokémon Titan is a Spanish Pokémon fan game. Discover a new story full of charismatic characters and exciting moments in the Aleteia Region.

Made with RPG Maker XP and Pokémon Essentials.
